segments.text: I think I am very good at planning . I manage my time well so that I can always get things done on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I always give each job my best efforts , so when others are not pulling their weight , I am frustrated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got the Scientific Research Prize from the Gansu government for my achievements in the Northwest Regional Economy Development Research Project .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Working under pressure is exciting and challenging . I don â€™ t mind . In fact , I am very efficient when certain pressure is exerted on the work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the problems you have encountered in your job and how do you solve them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There was a time when both the clerical assistant and the secretary resigned at the same time . I then had to handle their work temporarily . The workload was incredibly heavy . So I started to set priorities for the jobs and hired part-time staff to handle routine work . Finally , I managed to keep the operation smooth until we found someone to fill the vacancy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you deal with those who you think are difficult to work with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I stick to my principles and keep to the rules . Sometimes , they just lack enthusiasm and I get them involved with something constructive . Some of them change their attitude later .
segments.speaker: S2
